dialogue.content: Bright light gives me headaches sometimes.
Is it more a mild headache or a migraine-type episode?
More like migraines. I get nauseous if it gets bad.
Got it. Do you notice common triggers besides light?
Lack of sleep and long screen time can do it too.
Okay. Do you want prevention strategies or what to do in the moment?
Prevention, mostly. I want fewer episodes.
Understood. We'll focus on the biggest triggers you can control.
If I could reduce those light-triggered migraines, it would help a lot.
